response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value and importance, I am offering it to you at an exceptional price of $750,000. This represents a significant discount compared to the market value of $800,000, aiming to secure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
